title: Copywriting Fundamentals for Beginners
description: A comprehensive 4-week self-learning plan to master the basics of copywriting, understand effective writing techniques, and learn how to create compelling content that converts.

weeks.title: Introduction to Copywriting
learningObjectives: Understand the role and importance of copywriting in marketing
Learn the basics of writing compelling copy
Familiarize with different types of copywriting
topicsToCover: Overview of various copywriting formats (ads, web content, emails)
weeklyTasks: Analyze examples of effective copy from various formats
Write a short piece of copy for a hypothetical product

resources.name: Copywriting 101: The Fundamentals of Copy by Copyblogger

weeks.title: Crafting Compelling Content
learningObjectives: Master the art of headline writing
Learn techniques for engaging and retaining reader interest
topicsToCover: Building a narrative flow that retains readers
weeklyTasks: Practice writing various types of headlines
Create a blog post with a strong narrative and clear CTA
Gather feedback on your written content from peers or mentors

resources.name: The Copywriter's Handbook by Robert W. Bly

weeks.title: SEO and Digital Copywriting
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of SEO and its importance in copywriting
Learn how to optimize content for search engines
Explore tools for keyword research and SEO analysis
weeklyTasks: Conduct keyword research for a given topic
Write an SEO-optimized article using researched keywords
Use SEO tools to analyze and improve your content

resources.name: SEO Copywriting Tips for Writing Content that Ranks in Google

weeks.title: Advanced Copywriting Strategies
learningObjectives: Explore advanced techniques for persuasive writing
Learn about writing for different platforms and audiences
Develop strategies for testing and optimizing copy
topicsToCover: Adapting tone and style for different platforms
weeklyTasks: Experiment with writing for different platforms (social media, email, web)
Conduct an A/B test on different versions of an advertisement
Analyze the results and refine your copy based on feedback

resources.name: Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion by Robert Cialdini
Guide to A/B Testing for Copywriters
